Package glitch.api

Class AbstractHttpService

  • java.lang.Object
    • glitch.api.AbstractHttpService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyticsService, BitsService, BitsService, ChannelService, ChatService, ClipService, ClipsService, CollectionService, CommunityService, CredentialManager, GameService, GameService, IngestService, SearchService, StreamService, StreamService, TeamService, UserService, UserService, VideoService, VideoService, WebhookService
    public abstract class AbstractHttpService
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract HTTP Service provides HTTP Client for the RESTful operations for: Twitch API v5 glitch-kraken and New Twitch API glitch-helix.
